sentence: [Emphasis added] Reps. Ted Budd (R-NC), Paul Gosar (R-AZ), Scott Perry (R-PA), Mary Miller (R-IL), Louie Gohmert (R-TX), Matt Gaetz (R-FL), Madison Cawthorn (R-NC), Brian Babin (R-TX), Randy Weber (R-TX), Jeff Duncan (R-SC), Rodney Davis (R-IL), Lauren Boebert (R-CO), Andrew Garbarino (R-NY), Dan Bishop (R-NC), and Ralph Norman (R-SC) are co-sponsoring the legislation.

title: House Conservatives Challenge Joe Biden to Declare MS-13 Gang a ‘Foreign Terrorist Organization’

sentence: Rep. Scott Perry (R-Pa.), who chairs the ultra-conservative House Freedom Caucus to which Cawthorn belongs, said he plans to speak to the North Carolina Republican one-on-one about the incendiary comment.

title: McCarthy rips Cawthorn: He told me his story about orgies and coke was exaggerated
